alert.note: Alert for Grand Isle; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Grand Isle, northwestern Chittenden and southwestern Franklin Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strip of heavy rain with some gusty winds over South Burlington, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Essex Junction, South Burlington, Burlington International Airport, Burlington, Winooski, Essex, Colchester, Essex Junction Village, Williston, Milton, Shelburne, Westford, Fairfax, South Hero, Georgia, Fish Bladder Island, Mallets Bay State Park, Sand Bar State Park, Red Rock Point, and West Milton. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 83 and 104. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Grand Isle; Western Chittenden; Western Franklin
